Text: ~ hi Tv Team thanks for all your very fine work :) i downloaded this and the picture is perfect and audio on my pc if fine but if i stream to my ps3 i get no audio. is it just a codec? all you other up's work fine when streamed its just this one. not complaining just inquiring :) ~ P

I'm having a similar problem as the guy above, but instead of getting no audio, the audio is out of sync when burned to DVD. But it works fine when playing on my PC.

Hopefully another group releases this and fixes this problem.
What happened to Eddie? He used to be funny. This was as predictable as I've ever seen, and had more stolen jokes than Carlos Mencia.
